revised_title: Magnetic Observations at Zi-Ka-Wei: A New Observatory for Terrestrial Magnetism
tldr: The article discusses magnetic observations made at the New Observatory of Zi-Ka-Wei using self-recording magnetographs. The author reports on the progress of the observatory and the advancements in the science of terrestrial magnetism. The article also provides mean results of the magnetic observations, including declination, vertical intensity, inclination, horizontal intensity, and total intensity.
